title: Be You in Tech Summit to celebrate, recognize strength of diversity in tech - Pennsylvania State University
content: Be You in Tech Summit to celebrate, recognize strength of diversity in tech  Pennsylvania State University
description: Penn State students are invited to attend the inaugural 2022 Be You in Tech Summit: Bringing Your Authentic Self to the Information Age, to be held 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. Thursday, April 14, at Hyatt Place in downtown State College.
